local_intent: Execute a planar push along the cloth edge (0.1 at 180 deg) after confirming visibility and yaw alignment, then re-check visibility.
assumptions: Cloth is already in reachable contact height from prior steps
End-effector yaw is maintained at 90 degrees
coherence_with_global: Matches the global plan’s push parameters (cloth_edge, 0.1, 180, 1200). Uses visibility check and yaw condition consistent with prior Detect/Align/SetTCPYaw steps, providing a minimal perceive→align→act→verify sequence for the single push.
